name: To-Do
description:
- To-Do is a full-stack web app that allows users to add, change, organize, and complete tasks on their to-do list
 - Used ASP.NET Core to create a web API for communication between MySQL server and React frontend
 - Implemented declarative routing for transitioning between the siteâ€™s two pages
 - Used Node.js for continuous integration
 - Wrote unit tests using Jest and the React Testing Library
 - This project was inspired by the Microsoft To Do task management app

name: MorningBot
description:
- MorningBot is a Discord bot written in Python that provides a daily informational report every morning
 - Message includes current date, weather, and news

name: Nobel Prizes
description:
- Nobel Prizes is an iOS application that allows users to view a list of Nobel Prizes and navigate to a detailed view of each
 - Decoded JSON data in order to populate views

name: Rock, Paper, Scissors
description: - Rock, Paper, Scissors is a CLI game that allows users to play games, load and save progress, view statistics, and view a global leaderboard
